entries.journal_entry_description: After having studied the Sayormi Voodoo Dolls, Athnalu has asked you to find certain ingredients to 'cure' her from her illness. She requires 2 Snake Eyes, 2 pieces of Mouf hair and a Mysess Blossom. All the ingredients can be found in the Kkowir Forest.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Once the corroded corners of Athnalu's mind have been found, the Mouf hair will suffice in capturing the evil that lurks there. Find 2 pieces of Mouf hair for Athnalu and bring them back to her.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The eyes of the snakes living within the Kkowir Forest will find the evil inside Athnalu's mind, according to the deranged wookiee. Find 2 Snake Eyes and bring them back to Athnalu.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Athnalu explained to you that she needed a Mysess Blossom to 'make everything better'. Supposedly, the concoction Athnalu hopes to make will cure her and drive the voices away. Find a Mysess Blossom and bring it back to Athnalu.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Bring Athnalu the objects you have collected.
